Description: Like Magdon Music on Facebook! For your review and consideration- we present you with another fine Gibson Guitar from the guitar collection at Magdon Music! Please read the description below and review the photos. The exact guitar pictured and in the description is the exact guitar that you will be bidding on. If there is something that you need to know that is not in this description- please contact us at Magdon Music before bidding and we will be very happy to assist! *** Please note that our guitars are tech inspected before they go out the door! Buy with confidence from Magdon Music! ***Flat rate shipping is for the Continental USA (lower 48 only!) If you live outside of this area- please contact us for your ship rate. Pictured here we have a great deal on an authentic 2014 Gibson Les Paul Classic 120th Anniversary Electric Solid Body Guitar in Lemon Burst. This guitar comes with its original deluxe Gibson Case and the original paperwork (including the original price tag.) In really beautiful condition- this Gibson is a dream find for the Classic Anniversary lover! The guitar itself has some buckle rash on the back (to be expected) and outside of that- only very minor play wear. No fret wear. Just an exceptional guitar that has been well taken care of. This guitar has some really exciting upgrades! Brand new Dimarzio PUPS- a PAF 36th Anniversary Pup at the neck, and a Tone Zone at the Bridge. Also the circuit board has been taken out and replaced with a traditional style wiring harness w/ (4) 500K Pots. ***Flat rate shipping is for USA ONLY! (Lower 48 only!) (SC8M.SO) If there is anything else that you need to know about this guitar or if you would like an in-hand description or more photos- please feel free to give a jingle to our professional guitar department at Magdon Music. 1 8 8 8 Magdon 1 - we will be very happy to assist you! ***Please note that Magdon Music has showrooms full of guitars- both new and used. Not all of them are listed online. If you are looking for something specific and do not see it online- please feel free to contact us! Magdon Music is open Monday thru Friday 11am -7pm (est) and Saturdays from 11am - 4pm. Title: 2014 Gibson Les Paul Classic 120th Anniversary Lemon Burst w/Case & UPGRADES!
ConditionDescription: Dimarzio Pups & Traditional Style Wiring Harness Installed!
